title: What do Gallan Goodiyaan and Galliyan mean? - Quora

response.answer_text: Galliyan means streets. Gallan Goodiyan literally translates talk sweet as Gallan means saying and gud is sugarcane jaggery. Gud is really popular in Punjab and it’s often synonymous with sugar in slang terms.

Gallan Goodiyaan and Galliyan means that cheeks of his or her are very deep. for example dimples on the cheeks. Bollywood songs now days have this kind of punjabi lyrics which are like hard to understand by most of non-punjabi songs[1] listeners. Footnotes[1] Songs.PK - Download Bhangra Mp3 Songs
